description: This table contains basic information about imaging data from the performing modality. It also contains cumulative radiation dose information.

columns.name: IMY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the modality data record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record to which the modality data pertains.

columns.name: SOP_INSTANCE_UID
columns.description: The DICOM SOP Instance unique identifier of the message from modality. This ID is uniquely assigned for every image in a study.

columns.name: AET_FDD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Application Entity Title record from the FDD master file which specifies DICOM definitions for the performing modality.

columns.name: AET_FDD_ID_DICOM_NAME
columns.description: The name of an Application Entity (modality). This is not the AE Title.

columns.name: PPS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The PPS status category ID for the DICOM instance record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


IN PROGRESS


DISCONTINUED


COMPLETED

columns.name: PPS_START_DTTM
columns.description: The DICOM Performed Procedure Step Start Date and Time.

columns.name: PPS_END_DTTM
columns.description: The DICOM Performed Procedure Step End Date and Time.

columns.name: SOP_CLASS_FDD_ID
columns.description: The DICOM SOP Class of the message from the performing modality. DICOM capabilities are all expressed as Service-Object Pair Classes, identified by SOP Class names and unique identifiers.

columns.name: SOP_CLASS_FDD_ID_DICOM_NAME
columns.description: The name of an Application Entity (modality). This is not the AE Title.

columns.name: RDSR_MFR
columns.description: The manufacturer of the machine sending the data.

columns.name: RDSR_MFR_MODEL_NAME
columns.description: The model name of the machine sending the data.

columns.name: RDSR_STATION_NAME
columns.description: The station sending the data.

columns.name: RDSR_PROC_RPTD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The procedure reported category ID for the procedure reported to be performed for the DICOM instance record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Computed Tomography X-Ray


Projection X-Ray


Mammography

columns.name: RDSR_IRRD_STRT_DTTM
columns.description: The start time of irradiation.

columns.name: RDSR_IRRD_STOP_DTTM
columns.description: The end time of irradiation.

columns.name: RDSR_SCP_ACCUMLTN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The scope of accumulation category ID for the DICOM instance record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Study


Series


Performed Procedure Step


Irradiation Event

columns.name: RDSR_TOTAL_EFF_DOSE
columns.description: The aggregate effective dose.

columns.name: RDSR_TTL_MSR_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The total dose measurement method category ID for the DICOM instance.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


DLP to E conversion via MC computation


CTDIfreeair to E conversion via MC computation


DLP to E conversion via measurement


CTDIfreeair to E conversion via measurement

columns.name: RDSR_PAT_MODEL
columns.description: The effective does patient model.

columns.name: RDSR_REF_AUTH
columns.description: The effective dose reference authority.

columns.name: RDSR_TTL_DOSE_PHNTM
columns.description: The total effective dose phantom type.

columns.name: RDSR_DOSIMETER_TYPE
columns.description: The total effective dose dosimeter type.

columns.name: RDSR_DOSE_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the accumulated radiation dose.

columns.name: RDSR_PROC_INTENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The procedure intent category ID for the DICOM instance record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Diagnostic Intent


Therapeutic Intent


Combined Diagnostic and Therapeutic Procedure

columns.name: PPS_DESC
columns.description: The DICOM Performed Procedure Step Description.
